pageContext.claim: “Does the so-called ‘Senior Administration Official’ really exist, or is it just the Failing New York Times with another phony source? If the GUTLESS anonymous person does indeed exist, the Times must, for National Security purposes, turn him/her over to government at once!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump suggests the New York Times fabricated an anonymous op-ed writer, but he then undercuts his own theory by demanding the Times reveal the writer's identity.
